content: in mc 6 stitches rounds 2-5 single_crochet in each stich fasten_off leaving long tail tail round 1 6 single_crochet in mc 6 stitches round 2 single_crochet in each stitch around round 3 single_crochet increase 3 times 9 stitches rounds 4-12 single_crochet in each stitch around fasten_off leaving long tail and stuff assemble making sure both are facing forward long side of body and face of head match 16 stitches at bottom of head with the 16 stitches of the body and sew together attach arms on either side one row under head spaced as desired attach feet along bottom three row of body spaced as desired attach tail along bottom three row of the back of the body middle will allow cat to stand but can also be placed as desired heart balloon top make 2 round 1 6 single_crochet in mc 6 stitches round 2 increase each stitch around 12 stitches round 3 single_crochet increase 6 times 18 stitches rounds 4-5 single_crochet in each stitch around fasten_off leaving long tail on one circle sew 2 stitches from the middle of each circle together should form the two domes from top of heart body with the top of the domes facing down still working in the same direction as the tops attach yarn toward the center of the side closest to you round 1 single_crochet in each available stitch not the ones sewn together along the bottom of the domes 32 stitches round 2 single_crochet 6 decrease 4 times 28 stitches round 3 single_crochet in each stitch around round 4 single_crochet 5 decrease 4 times 24 stitches round 5 single_crochet 4 decrease 4 times 20 stitches round 6 single_crochet 3 decrease 4 times 16 stitches round 7 single_crochet 2 decrease 4 times 12 stitches round 8 single_crochet decrease 4 times 8 stitches stuff heart round 9 decrease 4 times 4 stitches fasten_off leaving tail long enough to serve as a balloon string for lying down or to wrap down chopstick for a balloon stick balloon stick assembly lightly coat top of chopstick in tacky glue or other clear drying glue and insert through bottom 4 stitches of round 9 allow to dry in place holding the secured heart at the top lightly coat remaining chopstick and carefully wrap yarn tail down the shaft allow to dry fully before using
